description:
The Dirt Devil® Vibe 3-in-1 Stick Vacuum is designed with you in mind. The lightweight design is easily portable for all your small messes. With on/off brushroll you can conveniently move from carpets to hard floors at the touch of a button. The brushroll helps to agitate carpeted surfaces and straight suction is perfect for hard floors. An easy empty dirt cup allows you to dispose of the dirt mess-free. For quick clean ups the new on/off brushroll stick vacuum is the easy lightweight solution.

Features:
Easy Empty Dirt Cup - makes emptying the dirt cup easy and mess-free.
On/Off Brushroll - turn brushroll 'on' for carpeted surfaces and 'off' for hard floor cleaning.
10" Nozzle - provides a path for quick clean-ups.
15 Foot Power Cord - long cord for kitchen, living room or bathroom messes.
Lightweight Design - easy transportation from room-to-room and up-and-down stairs.
Quick Release Cord - readily release the cord for everyday cleaning needs.
Detachable Handle - the handle detaches easily and efficiently for lightweight stair cleaning.
Limited 1-year warranty
title: Dirt Devil® Vibe® 3-in-1 Corded Stick Vacuum - SD20020

description: The BLACK+DECKER HSV420J42 2-in-1 stick vac provides you the versatility of a stick vacuum and a hand vac for quick and convenient clean ups with the push of a button. This stick vac is powered by a 14.4V lithium ion battery that holds a charge, offers fade free power, and is lighter than NiCad and NiMH batteries. It provides 14.2 Air Watts of power allowing you to pick up most debris. The up to 22 minutes of runtime allow you to get more cleaning done on a single charge while weighing only 4 lbs. 15 oz. making it easy to push and carry. This stick vac has an On/Off powered beater bar for better cleaning on carpeted surfaces and the large wheels glide smoothly over carpet. The tool-free removable beater bar and removable, washable 16.9 oz dust bowl and filters make cleaning simple and quick. The exhaust vent blows air away from your hands for your comfort. The HSV420J42 LED charge indicator lets you know when it is fully charged and ready to use. The stick vac is self standing for added convenience and ease of use. The sea blue color is attractive for storage in your house. Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.

description:
The Dyson V7 Motorhead cord-free vacuum has 75% more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 Cord-Free vacuum. Engineered for all floor types, the Direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles into the carpet to remove ground-in dirt. The Dyson V7 Motorhead cord-free vacuum quickly transforms to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.

• Cord-free. Hassle-free. Powerful suction.
• Up to 30 minutes of powerful fade-free suction. Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning.
• The Direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles deep into the carpet to remove ground-in dirt. It has 75% more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 Cord-free vacuum.
• Transforms to a handheld for beyond the floor cleaning.
• Hygienic dirt ejector empties dust from the bin in a single action.
• 2 Tier Radial cyclones – 15 cyclones, arranged across two tiers, work in parallel to increase airflow and capture fine dust.
• Max power mode provides up to 6 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks.
• Balanced for cleaning up top, down below and in between.
• All Dyson cordless vacuums quickly convert to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.
Convenient docking station stores and charges the machine, and holds additional attachments. So it's always ready to go.
title: Dyson® V7 Motorhead Cord-Free Vacuum

description:
The Dyson V8 Animal cord-free vacuum is engineered for homes with pets. The battery chemistry delivers up to 40 minutes of fade-free suction to clean even further. A direct-drive cleaner head sucks up pet hair and ground in-dirt across both carpets and hard floors. Powered by the Dyson digital motor V8, it generates 150% more brush bar power than the V6 Cord-free vacuum. And with whole machine HEPA filtration, it captures pet allergens and expels cleaner air too. Thanks to a revolutionary cord-free format, it also transforms for easy cleaning up high, and into a handheld for quick cleans close at hand. With an extra tool for tougher tasks.

• Cord-free. Hassle-free. The most powerful suction.*
• Up to 40 minutes of powerful suction (up to 25 minutes with motorized floor tool attached). Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning.
• Powered by the Dyson digital motor V8, it creates the most powerful cordless vacuum.*
• The Direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles deep into the carpet to remove ground-in dirt. It has 150% more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 Cord-free vacuum.
• Mini motorized tool for tough tasks. Stiff nylon bristles remove pet hair and ground-in dirt from furniture, car seats and tight spaces.
• Whole machine HEPA filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air than the air you breathe.
• Transforms to a handheld for beyond the floor cleaning.
• Hygienic dirt ejector empties dust from the bin in a single action.
• 2 Tier Radial cyclones – 15 cyclones, arranged across two tiers, work in parallel to increase airflow and capture fine dust.
• Max power mode provides up to 7 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks.
• Mini soft dusting brush for gentle dusting around the home.
• Balanced for cleaning up top, down below and in between.
• All Dyson cordless vacuums quickly convert to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.
Convenient docking station stores and charges the machine, and holds additional attachments. So it's always ready to go.

*Tested to ASTM F558 against cordless models.
title: Dyson® V8 Animal Cord-Free Vacuum

description:
Hoover® REACT Whole Home Cordless Advantage Vacuum BH53210 combines the power and suction you trust, with intelligent cleaning technologies to deliver The Ultimate Clean.* Automatically. FloorSense Technology Instinctively detects a change in floor type to optimize cleaning. The new WindTunnel Surge is paired with a lightweight design to help you tackle deep down embedded dirt and dust, not only on the floor but also up high. The ONE PWR Lithium Battery with rapid charge delivers 3X longer** run time and fade free power for a versatile whole home clean. Connectivity with the Hoover Home App allows users to customize their cleaning experience and maintain their Hoover REACT Cordless vacuum. For over 100 years, Hoover has reimagined the way we clean, delivering a complete collection of trusted, innovative and effective solutions designed to make cleaning easier for active families so they can get back to what matters most.

*Hoover® REACT vacuums combine FloorSense Technology with WindTunnelSurge to optimize performance of the machine automatically.
**Run time comparison based on Hoover REACT Cordless in high power mode versus leading stick vacuum in boost mode.
title: Hoover® REACT™ Whole Home Cordless Advantage - BH53210

description: The BLACK+DECKER 16V MAX* SMARTECH Lithium 2in1 Stick Vacuum features SMARTECH Technology and provides the versatility of a stick vacuum and a detachable hand vacuum. The innovative SMARTECH Technology features BATTERYSENSE which tells you how much battery charge remains so you know how much longer you can clean; FILTER SENSE alerts you when it’s time to wash the filter so you continue to get maximum performance, AUTOSENSE automatically adjust suction from bare floors to carpet so you get more power when you need it and less when you don't. POWERBOOST allows you to give your vac a boost of power with the push of a button. This stick vac is powered by a lightweight lithium ion battery that offers fade free power. It provides an impressive 30 Air Watts of power allowing you to pick up most debris. Weighing only 5.25 lbs making it easy to push and carry. This stick vac has an On/Off powered beater bar for better cleaning on carpeted surfaces and the large wheels glide smoothly over carpet. The tool-free removable beater bar and removable, washable 500 ml dust bowl and filters make cleaning simple and quick. The HSVJ415JMBF71 is self standing for convenience and ease of use and the titanium with eggplant color is attractive for storage in your house. The hand vac has a built-in extendable crevice tool and brush accessory for additional versatility. Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ MAX* Lithium 2in1 Stick Vacuum with SMARTECH™ Titanium 16V HSVJ415JMBF71

description: Ditch the cord and keep the power with the upright BISSELL® AirRam® Cordless Vacuum. Equipped with a professional-grade, 22V lithium ion battery, this high-powered, cord-free vacuum delivers up to 30 minutes of powerful, fade-free suction across carpets, hard floors, and area rugs. Its ultra-light, agile design with swivel steering and lay-flat handle easily maneuvers around and under furniture for maximized cleaning versatility. And when it comes to disposing of the vacuumed-up debris, the dirt bin is not only removable, but features a built-in, Easy Empty slider that pushes dirt and debris out for a quick, mess-free empty. In addition, BISSELL AirRam is engineered with a Multi-Surface Brush Roll plus Suction Sweep technology to deliver superior cleaning along edges and across multiple surfaces. Plus, its power foot features bright, wide-range LED lights that illuminate dirt so you can see it and vacuum it up. Enjoy a faster and easier way to vacuum your entire home with the powerful, cordless freedom of BISSELL AirRam.
title: BISSELL® AirRam 22V Cordless Stick Vacuum - Gray 1984

description: The BLACK+DECKER BDH2400FH 24V MAX Lithium Stick Vac With ORA Technology is a 2-in-1 Stick Vac with a detachable hand vac for cleaning versatility and easy accessibility.  The ORA Optimized Runtime + Airflow Technology and its 12 Air-Cyclones which help prevent clogging and deliver fade-free power and no loss of suction.  The BDH2400FH offers lithium technology for strong suction and fade free power and is lighter weight than NiCad or NiMH batteries.  It has and impressive 40 Air Watts of cleaning power as a hand vac and 23.4 Air Watts as a stick vac with up to 17 minutes of runtime.  This unit has a powered brush that allows for easy carpet cleaning - designed for carpet and hard floor surfaces, cars, stairs, couches and more.  A state of charge indicator lets you know how much run time is left.  The translucent bowl lets you see when you need to empty the dust bin and it removes with a push of a button for easy cleaning or changing of the filter.  It is free standing for ease of use and convenient storage.  Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a workload) is 24V, nominal voltage is 21.6.  Kit includes: Hand Vac, Stick Vac Floor Head Attachment, Extended Reach Pole with Flip-Up Brush, Retractable Crevice Tool, Wall Mount Charging Base, and (1) BDHSVF10 Filter.  Backed by a 2 Year Limited Warranty.

description: The BLACK+DECKER HSVJ520JMBF27 SMARTECH Cordless 20V MAX* Lithium 2-N-1 stick vacuum is a self-standing floor vacuum that converts to a hand-vac with the push of a button for carpet-to-curtains home cleaning and is packed with innovative SMARTECH technology to make your cleaning easier. The self-standing 2-N-1 hand/stick design provides two vacuums in one for cleaning on and above your floors.  BATTERYSENSE technology indicates your battery state of charge so you're never caught off-guard.  FILTERSENSE illuminates when your washable filter needs to be cleaned or replaced.  AUTOSENSE technolgy automatically adjusts the suction power for you from bare floors to high pile carpet as it senses a change in surface while you vacuum.  Choose low speed for sensitive applications such as vacuuming curtains + linens, or push the POWERBOOST button for extra suction of up to 30 Air Watts for other applications.  The On/Off powered brush bar helps you deep-clean carpets and area rugs or choose the proper setting for your cleaning needs with the push of a button. The 2.0 Ah lithium ion battery holds a charge longer, provides up to 25 minutes of runtime, and is lighter than NiCad.  The self-standing design keeps the vacuum upright and ready to use.  The HSVJ520JMBF27 comes in an attractive titanium with eggplant color.  The built-in extendable crevice tool helps you clean hard-to-reach areas, while 180° pivot steering  provides plenty of maneuverability around furniture.  The cyclonic action helps keep the filter clean and suction strong, with a washable filter that allows you to clean it when indicated and a tool-free detachable beater bar makes cleaning quick and simple.  The large 16.9 oz translucent bagless bowl allows you to do a lot of cleaning before emptying the bowl and makes it easy to see when you should empty the debris.  The bowl is easy to remove with the push of a button.  Kit includes: (1) Stick vac with hand vac, (1) Jack plug charger, (1) Extendable Crevice Tool, (1) Brush Attachment, (1) VPF10 Pre-Filter, and (1) VPF20 Pleated Washable Filter.  2 Year Limited Warranty.
title: BLACK+DECKER™ 20V MAX* Lithium Stick Vacuum with SMARTECH™ - Eggplant HSVJ520JMBF27

description: The BLACK+DECKER HSV520J01 18V Lithium Ion Cordless 2-N-1 stick + hand vacuum features a 2-in-1 design which provides for cleaning on and above your floors.  Use it as a stick vac on your floors or remove the hand vac for cleaning couches, tables, blinds, cars, and more.  This 2.0 Ah 18V stick vac has 14.8 Air Watts of power to help get tough jobs  done and up to 26 minutes of run time for long life.  Lithium technology provides strong suction, fade free power, is lighter than NiCad, and holds its charge for up to 18 months. The on/off powered brush bar allows you to thoroughly clean your carpets and area rugs with a motorized brush roll. The self-standing design lets you stand this vacuum upright where you need it, so it's always ready when messes arise. The detachable brush bar is easy to clean in between pick up jobs. An LED indicator provides a constant update on the battery charge level.  Smooth pivot steering makes it easy to maneuver around furniture. Low profile design allows you to easily reach under furniture while cleaning.  The 16.9 oz easy to clean translucent dirt bowl easily comes off with the push of a button and allows you to see when you need to empty the bowl.
